title: "Getting Started in R"
author: "Lindsay N. Hayes"
date: 2025-07-01

editor_options: 
  chunk_output_type: console
---


Script for in-class activity for lecture 01.

## Ways to Use R

### 1. Arithmetic


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
# addition/subtraction/multiplication/division

193 + 45
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[1] 238
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
2050 - 2025
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[1] 25
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
50/250 * 100
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[1] 20
```


:::
:::


### 2. Creating objects

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
# vector
# c(..., recursive = FALSE, use.names = TRUE)
x <- c(1:225)
class(x)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[1] "integer"
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
# matrix
# matrix(data, nrow, ncol, byrow, dimnames)
y <- matrix(1:225, nrow=15, ncol=15, byrow = FALSE)
class(y)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[1] "matrix" "array" 
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
# logical
# testing each variable in the vector and outputing TRUE or FALSE
over100 <- x>100
table(over100)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
over100
FALSE  TRUE 
  100   125 
```


:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
# install.packages("palmerpenguins")
library(palmerpenguins)
data <- penguins_raw
head(data)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
# A tibble: 6 × 17
  studyName `Sample Number` Species          Region Island Stage `Individual ID`
  <chr>               <dbl> <chr>            <chr>  <chr>  <chr> <chr>          
1 PAL0708                 1 Adelie Penguin … Anvers Torge… Adul… N1A1           
2 PAL0708                 2 Adelie Penguin … Anvers Torge… Adul… N1A2           
3 PAL0708                 3 Adelie Penguin … Anvers Torge… Adul… N2A1           
4 PAL0708                 4 Adelie Penguin … Anvers Torge… Adul… N2A2           
5 PAL0708                 5 Adelie Penguin … Anvers Torge… Adul… N3A1           
6 PAL0708                 6 Adelie Penguin … Anvers Torge… Adul… N3A2           
# ℹ 10 more variables: `Clutch Completion` <chr>, `Date Egg` <date>,
#   `Culmen Length (mm)` <dbl>, `Culmen Depth (mm)` <dbl>,
#   `Flipper Length (mm)` <dbl>, `Body Mass (g)` <dbl>, Sex <chr>,
#   `Delta 15 N (o/oo)` <dbl>, `Delta 13 C (o/oo)` <dbl>, Comments <chr>
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
colnames(data)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
 [1] "studyName"           "Sample Number"       "Species"            
 [4] "Region"              "Island"              "Stage"              
 [7] "Individual ID"       "Clutch Completion"   "Date Egg"           
[10] "Culmen Length (mm)"  "Culmen Depth (mm)"   "Flipper Length (mm)"
[13] "Body Mass (g)"       "Sex"                 "Delta 15 N (o/oo)"  
[16] "Delta 13 C (o/oo)"   "Comments"           
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
?penguins_raw
```
:::
